Date.description: The date the manual journal was created or last updated.

LineAmountTypes.description: Types of line amounts specified in the manual journal.

Status.description: Status of the manual journal (e.g., Draft, Posted).

Narration.description: Narrative description of the manual journal.

JournalLines.description: Details about the lines included in the manual journal.

LineAmount.description: The amount specified for this journal line.

Description.description: Description of the transaction in this journal line.

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount associated with this journal line.

AccountID.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with this journal line.

AccountCode.description: The account code associated with this journal line.

IsBlank.description: Indicates if the line is blank or has content.

TaxType.description: The type of tax applied to this journal line.

Tracking.description: Additional tracking information for this journal line.

Url.description: URL link to access the manual journal.

ShowOnCashBasisReports.description: Indicates whether the manual journal should be shown on cash basis reports.

HasAttachments.description: Indicates whether the manual journal has attachments.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time the manual journal was last updated.

ManualJournalID.description: Unique identifier for the manual journal.
